oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams: Complete Works Volume 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of a number of performances of Hank Williams Sr. (singer/songwriter). Tape is part of a collection labeled Hank Williams: Complete Works. Tape is labeled as part two of eight. The tapes were donated from the M.G.M. Studios collection.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Window Shopping (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (02:35) Weavin' Out Your Walkin' Shoes (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (04:26) A Teardrop on a Rose (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (07:03) Lost on the River (Hank Williams Sr. and Audrey Williams) -- (09:41) Jesus Died For Me (Hank Williams Sr. and Audrey Williams) -- (12:18) A Home in Heaven (Hank Williams Sr. and Audrey Williams) -- (14:53) Fool About You (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (16:39) The Pale Horse and His Rider (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (19:34) If You'll be a Baby to Me (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (21:20) Mother is Gone (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (24:00) Dear Brother (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (26:49) When You're Tired of Breaking Other Hearts (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (28:25) Low Down Blues (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (31:03) Someday You'll Call My Name (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (33:18) Alone and Forsaken (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (35:21) Weary Blues From Waitin' (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (38:07) Men With Broken Hearts (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (41:21) Too Many Parties and too Many Pals (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (44:27) The Funeral (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (47:36) Beyond the Sunset (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (50:44) Everything's Okay (Hank Williams Sr.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953. I saw the light;
